name: @SUMA_renumber_FS
author: AFNI Developers
description: This script processes FreeSurfer-generated parcellation files and produces various derived datasets and segmentation maps.

inputs.description: Path to the 'SUMA/' directory created by @SUMA_Make_Spec_FS.
inputs.name: SUMA directory

output-files.description: Whole parcellation/segmentation file with renumbered ROIs.
output-files.name: Renumbered parcellation

output-files.description: Ventricles and choroid plexus tissue segmentation map.
output-files.name: Ventricles and choroid plexus segmentation

output-files.description: Other tissue segmentation map (optic chiasm, non-WM-hypointens, etc.).
output-files.name: Other tissue segmentation

output-files.description: Unknown tissue segmentation map (FS-defined 'unknown', with voxel value >0).
output-files.name: Unknown tissue segmentation

output-files.description: White matter mask (excluding the dotted part from FS).
output-files.name: White matter mask

output-files.description: Labeltable of the new ROI values.
output-files.name: Labeltable
